data.title: Pastries, Pastries!
data.text: Great food and the best pastry anywhere. Right across the street from the Carlsbad Beach Resort.  Clean but small.  Good prices.

data.title: Terrible fish tacos
data.text: The fish tacos were far from the best. They were cold and tasteless. May be the meat ones are better but definitely not the place to go if you don't eat meat.

data.title: More Cessy's please!
data.text: I absolutely LOVE this place! Best little taco shop in town and great food served up fast. Friendly service and definitely has the small town beach vibe. Photos of happy Cessy's customers are on the walls and the have booths inside sit outside at a concrete style picnic table to watch the Harleys cruise on by. Salsa bar offers mild to zesty and they even keep a jug of water by the register to help yourself to in case your skipping the soda today! This is a great casual stop before or after a day at the beach.

data.title: Fish tacos
data.text: The ambience is very casual but the food is incredible.  Their fish tacos are priced well and some of the best I have had.  We did takeout and  then enjoyed the beach.

data.title: CALIFORNIA BURRITO
data.text: It was recommended by a friend..so we decided to go after our trip to legoland everyone loved it...i recommend the California burrito is amazingly good...wife and son loved it too...

data.title: Ok so so Mexican food
data.text: So my husband and I wanted hard shell tacos, and had saw this place while driving through town the night before.  So we decided to try them for lunch.  The service was great and friendly, but the tacos were so so, shells were very hard and chewy, with not a lot of meat, but lettuce and cheese were abundant.  Would try them again in the future.

data.title: Best in Carlsbad
data.text:
Just straightforward,  good, Mexican.
Can't go wrong.
Sit out front and watch the tourists go by.
Grab some homemade sauces to dip your delectables in.

data.title: Yummy tacos
data.text: A locals favorite.  Delicious food, generous portions and fast service.  Sometimes hard to get a table but you can take it to go.

data.title: Excellent and Quick Taco Shop in Carlsbad
data.text: Went to this authentic taco shop in Carlsbad, California and was surprised how fast the food was prepared. Everything was fresh and the salsa bar had very authentic salsas. Staff was friendly and they had inside and outside dining. Very affordable and filling burritos...

data.title: This place rocks for Cheap eats and a favorite of the locals
data.text: Great place to go if you're on a budget or just want to eat some lighter Mexican fare.  The staff is very friendly and the menu is plentiful.  Indoor and outdoor seating, with ice cream available for an after dinner palate cleanser or just the treat itself.  We took an order of chips and Guacamole back to our room and with a couple Tecates you can't go wrong.  We plan to go back and try more in our next visit to Carlsbad.

data.title: Cessy's
data.text:
Close to the beach, and amazing food! A bit on the pricey side, but definitely worth it for a yummy lunch! 
Thanks, Cessy's!

data.title: Put an end to Hunger!!
data.text: Great tacos and burritos!! Good selection of ingredients and the burritos are Huge,,,big enough to share. Grab some really good food and sit outside and enjoy yourself, you will not be hungry when you leave!

data.title: Not healthy, but delicious.
data.text: Cessy's is one of those places where you go when you're just craving a big, delicious pile of Mexican food. It's a little hole in the wall taco shop that is frequented by locals, especially teen locals. The food is good, but don't do it if you're watching calories. I like to go to Cessy's after a long, hard day when I'm craving some comfort food. If you're just visiting town and you want to try out the food the locals eat when they want something good, fast, and cheap, this is it. Try the California Burrito. Or some enchiladas. Whatever, It's all good.

data.title: Good food
data.text: This place was recommended by a local.  They have good service.  It was good and the prices were good too.  We were happy with the food choices and value.

data.title: Best hole-in-the-wall in North County
data.text: Good, quick Mexican food at the beach. Gotta have ice cream on the boardwalk on a hot day. Good salsa.

data.title: Not as Good as Usual
data.text: Was looking forward to the food. I have eaten here before and it has always been very good. The shrimp burrito was okay, but I expected more flavor. The beef taco tasted very good, but the taco shell was too thick and too crispy. The hot sauces were very good. I'll try somewhere else if I want Mexican food again.

data.title: Great Tacos and Soft Serve Ice Cream
data.text: Always good!  Lots burrito and taco selections-great breakfast burritos, too.  Quick and Easy. Ice cream is good, too.....

data.title: Average food, authentic, not very tasty
data.text: Stopped in for a quick bite.  Had a chicken taco and a beef taco.  Ground beef taco lacked flavor, no seasoning on the beef.  It's a typical dive Mexican restaurant which is usually a very good thing.  Was slightly disturbed that the cook didn't use gloves, everything was done with his bare hands.  I guess that's authentic, but I was a bit unnerved.

data.title: Cessy's a great place for a quick stop with awesome food.  YUM YUM!!
data.text: Cessy's is one of our families favorite places to get quick Mexican food.  It's nothing fancy, they have a few booths inside and a couple of concrete style tables outside.  The food is awesome and our kids couldn't wait to get there to eat when we arrived in town for our family trips.

data.title: Bit a Bone!!
data.text: My second visit here was I was so happy to order the Carnitas Plate, and I was so enjoying the beans, the rice and the great Carnitas meat, but about half way thru I chomped down on a piece of bone about the size of a tooth, I was instantly grossed out, got nauseous and couldn't eat any more, I was very lucky that I did not break my tooth as it was hard chomp. Even as Im writing this I instantly feel that awful feeling of finding that bone in my meal.. I couldn't get over it for the rest of the night. so needless to say I won't ever go back!
